name: puppylogger
description: A simple, mobile-friendly web app to track your new puppy's activities — naps, feedings, playtime, pee, and poop — with one-tap logging.

scripts.copy:static: npx cpx "src/**/*.{html,js}" dist && npx cpx CNAME dist/ && npx cpx ads.txt dist
scripts.minify:html: npx html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --file-ext html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run copy:static && npm run minify:html && npm run minify:js
